General.Name: Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of professional optical lenses in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides various optical lens products, including scanners, projectors, digital cameras, digital video recorders, multi-function printers, cell phone cameras, laptops, tablets, IP-cameras, monitors, automotive lens, etc.; and CCM/NB products, as well as lens for automotive, digital surveillance, special, professional, and other applications. It also offers technical services of precision optical lens. The company was formerly known as SHIAN-JINN Precision Optical Co., Ltd and changed its name to Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. in 2001. Ability Opto-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
